assistant_id.title: Assistant Id
assistant_id.description: The ID of the assistant. If not provided, a random UUID will be generated.

graph_id.title: Graph Id
graph_id.description: The ID of the graph the assistant should use. The graph ID is normally set in your langgraph.json configuration.

config.title: Config
config.description: Configuration to use for the graph. Useful when graph is configurable and you want to create different assistants based on different configurations.

context.title: Context
context.description: Static context added to the assistant.

if_exists.title: If Exists
if_exists.description: How to handle duplicate creation. Must be either 'raise' (raise error if duplicate), or 'do_nothing' (return existing assistant).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the assistant. Defaults to 'Untitled'.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the assistant. Defaults to null.
